O

onAddAppointment(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ListAppointments
When the Add button is pressed this method is called which will take data from the textfields and add it to the database.
onAppointmentTotals(Event) - Method in class controller.Report
When the Appointment Totals tab is opened, it populates a TextArea with data pulled from AppointmentsQuery using the reportTotalsByTypeAndMonth() method.
onBackButton(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ListAppointments
When the back button is pressed it will take the user back to the main menu.
onBackButton(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.Report
When the back button is pressed it will take the user back to the main menu.
onCancelButton(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.LoginMenu
When the cancel button is pressed this method is called and closes the application.
onContactScheduleCombo(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.Report
The onContactScheduleCombo method will change the appointmentsTable depending on which contact is selected, it pulls appointment information of the contact from the AppointmentsQuery getAllAppointments() method.
onCustomerAdd(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.CustomerMenu
When the Add button is pressed this method is called which will take data from the textfields and add it to the database.
onCustomerBack(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.CustomerMenu
When the back button is pressed it will take the user back to the main menu.
onCustomerClear(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.CustomerMenu
When the clear button is pressed, it will clear the text fields and ComboBoxes.
onCustomerCountry(Event) - Method in class controller.Report
When the Customers By Country tab is opened, it populates a Table with data pulled from ReportQuery using the getCountries() method.
onCustomerDelete(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.CustomerMenu
When the delete button is pressed this method is called and the selected item from the table will be deleted from the customers table, and the subsequent appointments associated with the customer.
onCustomerEdit(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.CustomerMenu
When the save button is pressed it calls this method.
onDeleteAppointment(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ListAppointments
When the delete button is pressed this method is called and the selected item from the table will be deleted from the Appointments table.
onLoginButton(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.LoginMenu
When the this method is called when the login button is pressed.
onUpdateAppointment(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ListAppointments
When the Update button is pressed this method is called his method only works if the customerListener method has has been called.
openConnection() - Static method in class helper.JDBC
The openConnection() method runs the driver and creates the connection variable.
